faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our services

faqs.question: How long does a typical project take?
faqs.answer: Most projects are completed within 2-4 weeks, depending on complexity and scope.

faqs.question: Do you provide ongoing maintenance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer maintenance packages to keep your website updated and secure.
